title: SLMC sacks Nazeer Ahmed
body_lines: Expulsion will lead to loss of his parliamentary seat if it is legally upheld Sri Lanka Muslim Congress ( SLMC) yesterday expelled its MP Nazeer Ahmed from the party, its leader MP Rauff Hakeem said.
Hakeem told Daily Mirror that the expulsion was done by the party’ High Command that met yesterday .
The expulsion will lead to the loss of his parliamentary seat if it is legally upheld. He has been removed on breach of party discipline by voting in favour of the Budget.
